name: The Kokeshi Curse
description:
Story:

The protagonist finds a job at a school where, after meeting a group of children, he learns that the school is cursed. After telling her a stranger about it, they bet on exploring the school, all for their greed. It is then that the protagonist discovers the twisted background of the school.

How To Install:
  1. Download the Game from Itch
  2. Extract the The Kokeshi Curse.zip file (once downloaded)
  3. Run: The Kokeshi Curse.exe
Trigger Warnings:
  • This game contains very loud noises.
  • This game contains flashing lights that may not be suitable for everyone.
  • This game contains visual effects that may cause motion sickness in some people.
Controls: W Walk Forward A Walk Left S Walk Backwards D Walk Right F Flashlight (When Available) MicrophoneInteract with Spirit (Not Necessary) Mouse Interact (Open Doors, Pick Up Items, Look) Download: Notes:
